title: Marvel Universe Vs. the Avengers (Trade Paperback)
description: In MARVEL UNIVERSE VS. THE PUNISHER, we journeyed through the ruins of our world. In the Bram Stoker Award-nominated MARVEL UNIVERSE VS. WOLVERINE, we witnessed the fall. Now, Marvel presents the war. Some worlds can’t be saved — but all worlds can be avenged. Dr. Doom says he can cure the cannibal plague consuming the Marvel Universe — but his price is to become Emperor of Earth. How far would you go to save the world? That’s the question the Avengers must answer — and fast, before they too succumb to the infection. And when Hawkeye finds himself the last man standing, stuck between two impossible evils, who will avenge our world if the battling bowman falls? Collecting MARVEL UNIVERSE VS. THE AVENGERS #1-4.
